name: papermark
description: Papermark is a self-hosted document analytics platform that gives insights into how PDFs are viewed. It supports secure sharing, view tracking, and integrates with tools like email and Slack.
features: Document analytics: Track how recipients interact with shared PDFs including page views, time spent, and engagement patterns
Secure sharing: Generate unique, time-limited links for document sharing with optional password protection and access controls
View notifications: Receive real-time alerts when recipients open, view, or complete reading your shared documents
Page-level tracking: See which specific pages were viewed, how long readers spent on each page, and which sections were skipped
Custom branding: Add your logo and brand colors to document viewing pages for professional, branded sharing experiences
Link expiration: Set expiration dates on shared links to automatically revoke access after specified time period
Email integration: Send documents directly via email with tracking enabled, or integrate with email tools for automated workflows
Slack notifications: Connect with Slack to receive document view notifications in channels or direct messages for team visibility
Download control: Enable or disable document downloads per link to control how recipients can save and share files
Viewer analytics: Collect data on viewer location, device type, and browser to understand audience and optimize content
